stravaIntegrationBody: Strava is an American internet service for tracking physical exercise which incorporates social network features.
modalUnlinkStravaBody: Are you sure you want to unlink your Strava account? Unlinking your Strava account will remove all your Strava activities and gear from Endurain.
bulkImportIntegrationBody: Bulk import activities from files stored in the bulk_import folder
errorMessageUnableToImportActivities: An error occurred while importing activities
garminConnectIntegrationBody: Garmin Connect is a health and fitness activity platform for users of Garmin devices
loadingMessageRetrievingGarminConnectAct: Récupération des activités de Garmin Connect
errorMessageUnableToGetGarminConnectActi: Impossible d'obtenir les activités de Garmin Connect
modalUnlinkGarminConnectBody: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir dissocier votre compte Garmin Connect ?
errorMessageUnableToUnlinkGarminConnect: Impossible de dissocier le compte Garmin Connect
errorMessageUnableToGetGarminConnectGear: Unable to get Garmin Connect gear
modalRetrieveHealthDataByDaysTitle: Récupérer les données de santé par jour
errorMessageUnableToGetGarminConnectHeal: Unable to get Garmin Connect health data
loadingMessageRetrievingGarminConnectHea: Récupération des données de santé de Garmin Connect
